name: Arapuã Bee and Friends
description: Trigona Sinipes, popularly named ''dog bee’’ or Arapuã. With great adaptability to pollinate and survive in different environments, This lovely stingless bee also lacks in aggressive behavior amongst other pollinator species, making off it a true nature guardian. These characteristics are fundamental restoring for degraded areas as its pollination increases the variety and amount of plants, consequently creating opportunities for local species to thrive and exist again. @julioglatt 2021
